required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effect of Different Meal Types on the Pharmacokinetics of DBPR108 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Randomized, Three-period, Crossover, Single-dose Study to Evaluate the Effect of a Low-fat Meal and a Standard Meal on the Pharmacokinetics of DBPR108 in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, randomized, three-period, crossover, single-dose study to evaluate the effects of a low-fat meal and a standard meal on the pharmacokinetics of DBPR108 and the safety and tolerability of DBPR108 under different fed states in healthy adult subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: The objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of different meal types on the pharmacokinetics of DBPR108, a potent dipeptidylpeptidase-4 inhibitor. In this open-label, randomized, three-period, crossover study, healthy subjects will receive a single dose of DBPR108 100 mg under fasted conditions and following a low-fat meal or a standard meal. Twenty-one healthy subjects will be randomized 1:1:1 to Sequence A, Sequence B, or Sequence C. This study will consist of a screening and baseline period, a treatment period, and a follow-up period. Blood samples for pharmacokinetic assessments will be taken pre-dose and up to 48 h post-dose.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and at prespecified time point after DBPR108 dosing on Day 1, Day 5 and Day 9.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time zero to the time of last measurable concentration (AUClast) of DBPR108
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and at prespecified time point after DBPR108 dosing on Day 1, Day 5 and Day 9.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time zero to infinity (AUCinf) of DBPR108
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and at prespecified time point after DBPR108 dosing on Day 1, Day 5 and Day 9.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to achieve maximum plasma concentration (Tmax) of DBPR108
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and at prespecified time point after DBPR108 dosing on Day 1, Day 5 and Day 9.
Predose and at prespecified time point after DBPR108 dosing on Day 1, Day 5 and Day 9.
Predose and at prespecified time point after DBPR108 dosing on Day 1, Day 5 and Day 9.

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of Distribution (Vz/F) of DBPR108
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and at prespecified time point after DBPR108 dosing on Day 1, Day 5 and Day 9.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive a single dose of DBPR108 100 mg under fasted condition, following a low-fat meal and a standard meal.
Subjects will receive a single dose of DBPR108 100 mg following a low-fat meal and standard meal, under fasted condition.
Subjects will receive a single dose of DBPR108 100 mg following a standard meal, under fasted condition, following a low-fat meal.

facility.name: First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University
